title: For Sale: Negro League Baseball Items w/Postcards, Cabinets & Photos (Part II)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: For Sale: Negro League Baseball Items w/Postcards, Cabinets & Photos (Part II)
posts.post_content:
Here is the second installment of Negro League Baseball items. Please see below scans along with key details, you can either PM or e-mail me at: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url].

1948 Negro League All-Star Team Photo w/Buck Leonard (HOF), Monte Irvin (HOF), Minnie Minoso & Luke Easter

Photo measures approximately 8" X 10" from the Buck Leonard Estate w/names penned in Buck's hand (JSA Authentic)      $N/A
(Getty Images watermark is NOT on the photo, just the scan)
